function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid return to high levels of emissions and urban air pollution after crisis","Impact":"Increased health risks and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Implementing and enforcing stricter emissions regulations, investing in green technologies and renewable energy sources","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, emission control technologies","People":"General public, especially in urban areas","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Short-term survival strategies supporting business-as-usual","Impact":"Delay in adopting sustainable energy transitions, continued reliance on non-renewable energy sources","Mitigation":"Education and awareness programs on sustainable energy, incentivizing businesses to adopt green practices","Technologies":"Energy efficiency technologies, sustainable business practices","People":"Businesses, policy makers, general public","Owner":"Government, sustainability organizations"},{"Description":"Social impacts shaping the politics of sustainable energy transitions","Impact":"Potential for unequal distribution of benefits, lack of equity in access to sustainable energy resources","Mitigation":"Policies promoting equitable access to sustainable energy, social inclusion programs","Technologies":"Smart grid technologies, decentralized energy systems","People":"Underprivileged communities, marginalized groups","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"}]}
